Fibers of elemental energy give this fine garment the ability to harvest dangerous forces and rebound them against aggressors.

Armor: Cloth

Enhancement Bonus: AC

Property:

You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against ongoing damage that has a type.

Power âœ¦ Encounter (Immediate Reaction)

Trigger: You take damage that has a type.

Effect: Your next melee or ranged attack made before the end of your next turn deals 1d6 extra damage of the triggering damage type. If you do not make an attack before the end of your next turn, you take this damage, and the power is not expended.

Level 15 or 20: 2d6 extra damage.

Level 25 or 30: 3d6 extra damage.
